hero.title: Visualisation
hero.subtitle: Studio
hero.description: Professional pattern generation toolkit for creative branding and packaging design. Create unique geometric patterns, flowing textures, and dynamic visual systems with precision control.

tools.title: Visualisation Tools
tools.description: Comprehensive toolkit for creating sophisticated patterns and textures for professional design applications.

gridField.title: Grid Field
gridField.description: Generate structured geometric patterns perfect for packaging backgrounds and brand textures.

flowField.title: Flow Field
flowField.description: Create flowing, organic patterns ideal for modern brand identities and packaging wraps.

turbulence.title: Turbulence
turbulence.description: Design complex swirling patterns and textures for premium packaging and brand elements.

topography.title: Topography
topography.description: Build layered contour patterns for sophisticated packaging design and brand depth.

circularField.title: Circular Field
circularField.description: Craft concentric ring patterns and radial designs for logos and circular packaging.

waveInterference.title: Wave Interference
waveInterference.description: Explore wave interference patterns and harmonic interactions for scientific visualisation.

waveInterference2.title: Wave Interference 2
waveInterference2.description: Advanced quantum-inspired wave interference with complex patterns and experimental physics.

particleSwarm.title: Particle Swarm
particleSwarm.description: Simulate flocking behaviour and collective intelligence with interactive particle systems.

fractalTree.title: Fractal Tree
fractalTree.description: Generate recursive branching patterns and organic growth simulations.

neuralNetwork.title: Neural Network
neuralNetwork.description: Visualise artificial neural networks with dynamic activation patterns and learning.

cellularAutomata.title: Cellular Automata
cellularAutomata.description: Explore emergent behaviour and complex patterns from simple rule-based systems.

soundWave.title: Sound Wave
soundWave.description: Analyse sound waves, harmonics, and frequency spectra with interactive visualisation.

suggestions.title: Community Ideas
suggestions.description: Share your ideas and feedback to help improve Visualisation Studio. Vote on existing concepts and contribute your own creative suggestions for new features.
suggestions.shareCreativeConcepts: Share ideas and vote on new features
suggestions.noIdeasFound: No ideas found matching your filters.

visualisationSettings.noAttractors: No attractors yet. Use the controls above to add attractors.
visualisationSettings.disableMajorContours: Set to 0 to disable major contour lines
visualisationSettings.majorContourDescription: How often to draw thicker contour lines
visualisationSettings.styleInfo: Style: Black and white topographic lines
visualisationSettings.smoothnessDescription: Higher values create smoother, more organic patterns with better performance
visualisationSettings.lineDensityDescription: Control the amount of interference lines shown (higher = more lines)
visualisationSettings.interferenceContrastDescription: Adjust the visibility and intensity of interference patterns (higher = more visible)
visualisationSettings.defaultWaveType: Default Wave Type for New Sources
visualisationSettings.noWaveSources: No wave sources yet. Use the controls above to add wave sources.

about.title: About Visualisation Studio

professionalGeneration.title: Professional Pattern Generation
professionalGeneration.description: Visualisation Studio provides a comprehensive toolkit for creating sophisticated patterns and textures. Whether you're designing packaging, branding materials, or digital assets, our tools offer the precision and flexibility needed for professional results.

about.additionalInfo: Each visualisation tool is designed with both creative freedom and technical precision in mind, allowing you to explore endless possibilities while maintaining control over every aspect of your design.

poweredBy.title: Powered by H23
poweredBy.description: Developed by H23, a creative technology agency that specializes in building digital tools and experiences for ambitious brands.
poweredBy.expertise: Our expertise in creative technology, branding, and interactive experiences informs every aspect of Visualisation Studio, ensuring it meets the needs of professional designers and creative teams.

descriptions.gridField: Create a field of lines that respond to magnetic poles
descriptions.flowField: Design magnetic field illustrations with custom poles
descriptions.circularField: Visualise circular field lines around magnetic poles
descriptions.waveInterference: Explore wave interference patterns with multiple sources
descriptions.particleSwarm: Watch particles flock and swarm with emergent behaviour
descriptions.fractalTree: Generate beautiful fractal trees with recursive branching
descriptions.turbulence: Explore turbulent flow fields with vortices and noise
descriptions.topography: Generate topographic contour lines from elevation points
descriptions.neuralNetwork: Interactive neural network with animated connections and learning
descriptions.cellularAutomata: Conway's Game of Life with custom rules and patterns
descriptions.soundWave: Real-time audio waveform with frequency analysis

metadata.title: Visualisation Studio
metadata.description: Professional pattern generation toolkit for creative branding and packaging design. Create unique geometric patterns, flowing textures, and dynamic visual systems with precision control.

error.pageLoadError: An error occurred while loading this page. Please try refreshing or contact support if the problem persists.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved or deleted from Visualisation Studio.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.lostConnection: It looks like you've lost your internet connection. Some features may not be available while offline.
offline.checkConnection: Check your internet connection and try again

pwa.addToHomeScreen: Add to home screen for quick access
pwa.settingsDescription: Manage Progressive Web App settings and installation
pwa.showInstallGuideAgain: This will show the installation guide again

cellular.instructionToggleCells: Click on the grid to toggle cells
cellular.instructionStepSimulation: Use Step Simulation to advance one generation
cellular.instructionTryRules: Try different rule sets to see new behaviours
cellular.instructionPatternCenter: Patterns will be placed at the centre of the grid

sound.instructionFrequencyAnalysis: Real-time frequency analysis will be displayed
